item.title: 6.3 Creating Groups
item.description: 6.3 Create a group Step 1. Add OCI group Log in to the OCI console as administrator. Open the navigation menu in the OCI console. Go to Identity & Security » Identity » Groups. After creating Cloud Account, you can see that there is only one Administrators group. Click Create Group Enter group information Name: Enter “SandboxGroup” Description: Enter a description, Ex) same name as “SandboxGroup” Click Create Step 2. Add User to Group Click the created group.
